name: Transitional Housing Services - Step-down
description: Epiphany Center Step-Down supports women who have completed a structured residential treatment program and need additional time to prepare for life post-treatment. The goal is to strengthen each woman’s recovery skills and to support her in securing permanent housing and employment.
